body:
Using #23053 
```console
$ spack  audit packages --name=catalyst
PKG-DIRECTIVES: 1 issue found
1. catalyst: wrong variant in "depends_on" directive
    the variant 'mpi' does not exist
    in /Users/culpo/PycharmProjects/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/catalyst/package.py
```
title: catalyst: mpi variant was never declared
